rules_text:
Search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Psyop {X}{G} [i](You may cast this face down for {2} as an artifact with “{1}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate as a sorcery.” Pay its psyop cost as a sorcery to exile then cast it.)[/i]
